item.description:
特朗普减税政策是如何出台的？【原文：

item.title: 经济担忧加剧，土耳其股市濒临熊市
item.description: 随着中东紧张局势的最新爆发，土耳其股市正处于进入熊市的边缘，股票吸引力下降，经济前景堪忧，这使得本已低迷的市场情绪雪上加霜。【原文：Turkish stocks are on the cusp of entering a bear market as the latest flare up in Middle East tensions adds to already poor sentiment amid lower appeal of equities and concerns over the outlook of the economy.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会争议中心加密货币暴跌，该机构对判决提出上诉
item.description: 加密货币 XRP 一直是其发行商和美国证券交易委员会（SEC）之间旷日持久的法律战的焦点，在该机构对早前一项被认为对该公司有利的法院裁决提出上诉后，XRP 的跌幅高达 11%。【原文：XRP, the cryptocurrency that has been the focal-point of a long running legal battle between its issuer and the SEC, slumped as much as 11% after the agency appealed an earlier court ruling that was viewed as favorable for the company.】

item.title: 银行从私人信贷中收回 300 亿美元债务交易
item.description: 银行正利用利率降低的机会，从私人信贷基金手中夺回企业债务交易，在近几年失去市场份额后卷土重来。【原文：Banks are capitalizing on lower interest rates to claw back corporate debt deals from private credit funds, staging a major comeback after losing market share in recent years.】

item.title: 高成本迫使项目退缩，绿色氢能炒作褪色
item.description: 气候友好型氢曾是绿色能源中最热门的领域之一。现在，其高昂的成本正在使其付出代价。【原文：Climate-friendly hydrogen was one of the most-hyped sectors in green energy. Now the reality of its high cost is taking its toll.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团寻求向坦桑尼亚电力线路投资 9 亿美元
item.description: 据东非国家的一位官员透露，坦桑尼亚正在与阿达尼集团洽谈一个价值 9 亿美元的公私合营项目，以建设高压输电线路。【原文：Tanzania is in talks with the Adani Group for a $900 million public-private partnership project to construct high-voltage power lines, according to an official of the east African nation.】

item.title: 中国龙 "ETF 在牛市回归之际登陆华尔街
item.description: 周四，在中国实施全面经济刺激计划之后，中国股市正式进入牛市之际，一只旨在捕捉中国最大公司业绩表现的新交易所交易基金即将发行。【原文：A new exchange-traded fund looking to capture the performance of China’s biggest companies is launching Thursday, just as the nation’s stocks officially enter a bull market following a sweeping stimulus package.】

item.title: 获得能源部 11 亿美元贷款承诺后，EVgo 公司业绩增长 41
item.description: 在电动汽车充电公司获得美国能源部高达 10.5 亿美元的贷款担保后，EVgo 公司的股价最高跃升 41%，创下自 2021 年 11 月以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Shares of EVgo Inc. jumped as much as 41%, the most intraday since November 2021, after the electric vehicle charging company received a loan guarantee of up to $1.05 billion from the US Department of Energy.】

item.title: 家长反对后，纽约市学校改变了手机禁令的方向
item.description: 纽约市学校校长戴维-班克斯（David Banks）说，"现在还不是时候 "禁止在学校使用手机，他的理由是，上个月上西区两所学校被封锁时，家长们很难联系到自己的孩子。【原文：New York City Schools Chancellor David Banks said “now is not the time” to ban cell phones in schools, citing concerns from parents who struggled to reach their children during a lockdown at two Upper West Side schools last month.】

item.title: Visa 推出平台帮助银行在全球发行稳定币
item.description: 随着越来越多的金融机构和企业对加密货币和区块链技术如何改善其运营表示出兴趣，维萨公司（Visa Inc.【原文：Visa Inc. is launching a platform for banks to issue fiat-backed tokens such as stablecoins and tokenized deposits, as more financial institutions and businesses express interest in how cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology can improve their operations.】

item.title: 台积电获得单只股票 ETF，Direxion 基金允许杠杆投注
item.description: Direxion Funds 推出了两款交易所交易产品，专注于单一新兴市场股票台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Direxion Funds has launched two exchange-traded products that focus on a single emerging-market stock — Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. — allowing investors to make outsized bullish bets on it or take positions against the direction of the market.】

item.title: Blackstone 寻求在新亚洲收购基金中投资超过 100 亿美元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，Blackstone Inc. 计划为其第三支亚洲私募股权投资基金募集超过 100 亿美元的资金，因为该公司正加紧在日本和印度的部署。【原文：Blackstone Inc. plans to raise more than $10 billion in its third Asia private equity fund as the firm ramps up deployment in Japan and India, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: PayPal 使用稳定币完成首次商业交易
item.description: 贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. completed its first business payment using its proprietary stablecoin as a way to demonstrate how digital currencies can be used to improve often-clunky commercial transactions.】

item.title: 新太阳能将满足欧洲冬季大部分电力需求增长
item.description: 目前，欧洲太阳能发电能力的增长非常强劲，即使在冬季，该技术也能满足大部分电力需求的增长。【原文：The increase in European solar capacity is now so strong that even during the winter the technology will satisfy most of the growth in electricity demand.】

item.title: 并购公司在并购干旱中举债向投资者赔款
item.description: 近几个月来，英国一家汽车玻璃维修公司的私募股权支持者将从高杠杆债务发行中获得有史以来最大的一笔回报，这表明垃圾债务市场已经变得非常开放。【原文：In a sign of how wide-open junk-debt markets have become in recent months, the private equity backers of a UK vehicle glass repair company are set to score one of the largest-ever payouts from a highly leveraged debt offering.】

item.title: 南非酝酿缓解电价上涨的措施
item.description: 南非电力部长 Kgosientsho Ramokgopa 表示，南非政府正在考虑采取措施抵消拟议的电价上涨，包括推迟提高碳税的计划。【原文：South Africa’s government is considering measures to offset a proposed power-price hike, including delaying plans to raise carbon taxes, Electricity Minister Kgosientsho Ramokgopa said.】

item.title: 贷款人彭伯顿将接管德国招聘网站 Univativ
item.description: Triton Partners 准备将人事服务提供商 Univativ 的股权移交给私人信贷基金 Pemberton Asset Management，后者是该公司的现有贷款人。【原文：Triton Partners is poised to hand over the keys of personnel provider Univativ to private credit fund Pemberton Asset Management, an existing lender to the company.】

item.title: 克里姆林宫九月份石油收入增长，企业却要付出代价
item.description: 由于俄罗斯政府将每月对本国原油生产商的补贴减半，从而抵消了能源价格疲软的影响，俄罗斯国家石油收入在 9 月份出现了年度小幅增长。【原文：The Russian state’s oil revenue showed slight annual growth in September, as the government offset weaker energy prices by halving monthly subsidies to the nation’s crude producers.】

item.title: 意大利计划对企业征收意外税以削减预算赤字
item.description: 意大利财政部长吉安卡洛-乔盖蒂（Giancarlo Giorgetti）表示，意大利计划对近年来经济动荡中获益最多的公司增税，以帮助降低国家预算赤字。【原文：Italy plans to raise taxes on the companies that benefitted most from the economic turbulence of recent years in order to help bring down the country’s budget deficit, Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti said.】

item.title: 安哥拉宽扎从 25 年低点回升，中央银行进行干预
item.description: 安哥拉中央银行恢复向商业贷款机构出售外汇后，安哥拉宽扎对美元的汇率从25年来的低点回升。【原文：Angola’s kwanza recovered from a 25-year low against the dollar after the oil-producing nation’s central bank resumed foreign currency sales to commercial lenders.】

item.title: 瑞典银行首席财务官卡尔松离职，负责贷款机构的美国业务
item.description: 瑞典银行（Swedbank AB）已开始招聘新的首席财务官，此前Anders Karlsson将转任该银行美国分行的首席财务官。【原文：Swedbank AB has started the hiring process for a new chief financial officer after Anders Karlsson will move to a new role running the lender’s US branch.】

item.title: 台湾股市休市两天后恢复交易
item.description: 受台风克拉森影响，台湾股市和汇市关闭了两天，周五将恢复交易。【原文：Taiwan’s stocks and currency markets will likely play catch up on Friday as trading resumes following a two-day closure caused by Typhoon Krathon.】

item.title: 中国股市涨势停滞引发新兴市场股市更大范围下跌
item.description: 由于地缘政治担忧笼罩新兴市场，盖过了对世界第二大经济体刺激政策的欣喜，中国股市停止了史诗般的涨势，股东财富因此增加了 3.45 万亿美元，资金流入量也创下二十年来之最。【原文：Chinese stocks halted an epic rally that added $3.45 trillion to shareholder wealth and witnessed the biggest fund inflows in two decades as geopolitical concerns gripped emerging markets, overshadowing euphoria over stimulus in the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 俄罗斯努力销售液化天然气对美国来说是双赢之举
item.description:
弗拉基米尔-普京希望在 2030 年前将出口增加两倍的雄心壮志看起来有些夸张，这对华盛顿来说是个好兆头。【原文：

Vladimir Putin’s ambition to triple exports by 2030 looks like a stretch, and that bodes well for Washington.

】

item.title: 利比亚将重启石油生产，结束瘫痪危机
item.description: 利比亚石油部长哈利法-阿布-萨迪克（Khalifa Abul Sadeq）在接受彭博社采访时表示，利比亚将从周四开始恢复石油生产，此举有可能使这个欧佩克国家在经历政治僵局之后，每天有数十万桶石油重返全球市场。【原文：Libya will resume oil production starting Thursday, Oil Minister Khalifa Abul Sadeq told Bloomberg in an interview, a move that potentially returns hundreds of thousands of barrels a day to global markets after a political standoff in the OPEC nation.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦阔别十年后重返美元债券市场
item.description: 今年早些时候，一场引发资产扣押威胁的法律纠纷得到解决，哈萨克斯坦近十年来首次重返美元债券市场。【原文：Kazakhstan is returning to the dollar-bond market for the first time in almost a decade after a legal dispute that raised the threat of asset seizures was resolved earlier this year.】

item.title: 加纳称债券持有人绝大多数支持债务重组
item.description: 加纳获得了国际债券持有人 "压倒性 "的参与和支持，以重组其 130 亿美元的海外债券，这是西非国家债务重组的关键一步。【原文：Ghana received “overwhelming” participation and support from its international bondholders to restructure $13 billion of its overseas bonds, a key step of the West African nation’s debt rework.】

item.title: 英伟达内部股票销售额高达 18 亿美元，而且还将有更多新股上市
item.description: 今年到目前为止，Nvidia 公司内部人士已经套现了价值超过 18 亿美元的股票，而且更多的抛售即将发生。【原文：Nvidia Corp. insiders have cashed in on shares worth more than $1.8 billion so far this year — and more selling is on the horizon.】

item.title: 前花旗亚洲部交易员在不公正解雇胜诉后达成和解
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）与一名前交易员的雇佣诉讼达成和解，法官裁定该交易员被银行解雇是不公平的，因为他声称自己是该银行十年来在为亚洲客户执行股票交易时监管失误的替罪羊。【原文：Citigroup Inc. settled an employment suit with an ex-trader after judges ruled he was unfairly dismissed by the bank over claims he was scapegoated for the lender’s decade-long regulatory failures in executing stock trades for clients in Asia.】

item.title: 受欧洲央行降息押注影响，欧元将创五个月来最差走势
item.description: 由于交易商押注欧洲央行将采取越来越激进的降息措施，欧元有望创下 4 月以来最长连跌纪录。【原文：The euro is poised for its longest losing streak since April as traders bet on an increasingly aggressive path for interest-rate cuts by the European Central Bank.】
